General.Name: Hung Chou Fiber Ind Co Ltd
General.Description: Hung Chou Fiber Ind. Co., Ltd manufactures and sells polyester filaments in Taiwan and internationally. It offers polyester chips, polyester pre-oriented yarns, polyester fully drawn yarns, polyester drawn textured yarns, and biodegradable yarns. The company also provides functional MB non-woven fabrics for medical application; antibacterial fibers for medical disposable, personal care, apparel, and filtration application; and dyeable graphene fibers for garment, apparel, bedding, sheet, sportswear, outfits, and protective gear application. In addition, it engages in the manufacture, processing, and trading of synthetic chemical fibers and plastic spinning products. The company was formerly known as Hung Chou Chemical Industries Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Hung Chou Fiber Ind. Co., Ltd in June 2015. Hung Chou Fiber Ind. Co., Ltd was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
